name: Infographic Design Game
description:
A Tetris-inspired game where you get feedback for the infographics you design. Made as part of a larger design workshop. 

Feedback given may not be 100% accurate and are suggestions.

Controls:

  • Left-Click to Select.
  • Right-Click and Drag to Move About.
  • Scroll Wheel to Scroll.
  • Control+Scroll to Zoom.

Feedback is appreciated, send them here! 
https://forms.gle/sTjmbLCFD6DPdF9n9
